items.question: Do I need to create an account?
items.answer: No! Simply enter your name and email during registration. Your access link will be sent directly to your email.

items.question: What payment methods are accepted?
items.answer: We accept all major credit cards, Apple Pay, and Google Pay through our secure Stripe payment system.

items.question: How do I access the online class?
items.answer: After payment, you'll receive an email with the event details and a direct link to join the online class (Zoom or Google Meet).

items.question: Can I get a refund?
items.answer: Refund policies vary by event. Please contact the event organizer directly for refund requests.

items.question: Is my payment information secure?
items.answer: Absolutely! All payments are processed securely through Stripe. We never store your card details.
